DIA_Bodyguard01_HELLO_WeirdCoin_03_01: The boss is inside. He's waiting for you.
DIA_Bodyguard01_GoAway_03_01: I don't have time. Go see the boss.
DIA_Bodyguard_Fight_Nightmare_15_01: Yes, it's me, your worst nightmare.
DIA_Bodyguard_Fight_Nightmare_03_02: Now you've made me laugh, kid.
DIA_Bodyguard_Fight_Nightmare_03_03: Well, that was nice, but it's time to feed the swampsharks.
DIA_Bodyguard_Fight_Looking_15_01: Have you been looking for me?
DIA_Bodyguard_Fight_Looking_03_02: Uh, yeah... my boss told me to tell you something...
